name: Schedule Consultations with the Writing and Communication Center!
description:
MIT’s Writing and Communication Center offers free one-on-one consultations and coaching with communication specialists. You can receive support at all stages of the writing and communication process, from brainstorming to the final version, on such projects as research papers, fellowship applications, cover letters, personal statements, dissertations, presentations, or posters. The WCC can also mentor you through writer’s blocks, including procrastination, perfectionism, demoralization, and imposter stress. 

You can learn more about WCC consultations at the WCC website and book an appointment through https://mit.mywconline.com. Please note that the WCC hours are offered Monday-Friday, 9:00 a.m.-6:00 p.m., and fill up fast.

location.name: Building E18 room 233 or connect via Zoom
